name: NICO
description: Niconico.ai is an intelligent copilot designed to enhance your experience on the Solana blockchain. By leveraging APIs from DeepSeek, Helius, and Privy, it offers AI-driven assistance for seamless on-chain interactions. Key features include trend analysis, token insights, on-chain execution, price predictions, and comprehensive token analysis.
